## Week 2 Objectives

### By the end of week two, students should be able to:  

* Define, compare, and contrast vectors, lists, matrices, and data frames.  

* Create vectors, lists, matrices, and data frames.  

* Use `$`, `[]`, and `[[]]` notation to index and retrieve desired values/entries/elements.

* Create a well formatted R Markdown file that effectively delivers work done with R.  

* Load a .csv and perform summary statistics on any given column. 
    + This includes creating a well organized directory structure as well as setting your working directory within R!
